name: travel_delays
rows: Crash on I-81 southbound between Exit 100: PA 443 - PINE GROVE and Exit 90: PA 72 - LEBANON. All lanes closed.
Downed tree in wires on PA 225 both directions between MOUNTAIN HOUSE RD and CALLOWHILL ST. All lanes now open.
Road work on I-476 South. The right shoulder is closed.
Crash on I-81 southbound 1.3 miles south of Exit 85: PA 934 - ANNVILLE/FT INDIANTOWN GAP. There is a lane restriction.
Crash on PA 8 northbound 0 miles NORTH of Exit: PA 28 NORTH - SHARPSBURG. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on I-476 southbound 1.4 miles north of Exit 9: PA 3 - UPPER DARBY/BROOMALL. There is a shoulder closed.
